    • Method Detail

      • setSource

        public void setSource(GifDrawableBuilder.Source source)
        Sets the source of the animation. Pass null to remove current source.
        Parameters:
        source - new animation source, may be null

      • setSpeed

        public void setSpeed(float factor)
        Sets new animation speed factor.
        Note: If animation is in progress (TextureView.draw(Canvas)) was already called) then effects will be visible starting from the next frame. Duration of the currently rendered frame is not affected.
        Parameters:
        factor - new speed factor, eg. 0.5f means half speed, 1.0f - normal, 2.0f - double speed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if factor<=0

      • getIOException

        public java.io.IOException getIOException()
        Returns IOException occurred during loading or playing GIF (in such case only GifIOException can be returned. Null is returned when source is not set or surface was not yet created. In case of no error GifIOException with GifError.NO_ERROR code is returned.
        Returns:
        exception occurred during loading or playing GIF or null

      • setScaleType

        public void setScaleType(android.widget.ImageView.ScaleType scaleType)
        Controls how the image should be resized or moved to match the size of this ImageView.
        Parameters:
        scaleType - The desired scaling mode.

      • getScaleType

        public android.widget.ImageView.ScaleType getScaleType()
        Returns:
        the current scale type in use by this View.
        See Also:
        ImageView.ScaleType
